hey Awesomenauts!

I just installed KSP on my Laptop and it starts in Window mode, which is normal. BUT: If i want to change it from Window to full screen mode, i have to go to settings and there starts my problem: The buttons apply, cancel, .. are BEHIND my task bar so i cant click them.

Can anybody in here help me with this problem? my screen is 15.6 inches and has got the resolution 13xx 7xx.

thx a lot for your time

PS: i got windows 8.1

Edited December 21, 2014 by Claw
You can change modes with Alt+Enter, and you can hide your taskbar in Windows, try right clicking on it
